title: Voice Chat for Full Team will Riot make this a thing so when you go into games
body:
Voice Chat for Full Team will Riot make this a thing so when you go into games XD

So if you had a ranked game 4 players or a normal game it gives you that communication tool or not a possibility :P

replies.body: Heck no! Having been blessed with the farting, belching, screaming and toxic foulness in team chat - I am quite thankful that this is not a feature.  I already have to mute all in game - and at least I can report any nasty stuff knowing that there is evidence in chat transcripts.

whats wrong with farting and belching XD ahaha :P
you could always have like a mute button for them like any game does Battlefield 5 and Apex etc etc.

Once the feature is introduced, it becomes an expectation for any team play.  (Plus let's keep in mind that the games you mention above are known for being even more toxic than League.)  And you forgot to mention the kid who screams at his mother or sister when they enter the room as they are playing.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Hello no. I don't want some kid screeching in my ear.
hahaha i can just imagine a kid going reeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
